--- title: "Regression Discontinuity" author: "Shashidhar Cheeti" number-sections: false --- # Assignment ::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_2fe756daa97becd2169932b8c6afeae1'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load necessary Libraries library(tidyverse) library(dplyr) library(ggdag) library(dagitty) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_a6e1bccd1f2ac54b525f16d1888b83cb'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load the file coupon<- readRDS("Causal_Data_Science_Data/coupon.rds") # Create a Data Frame df=data.frame(coupon) head(df) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_e4f24057d7be8e6d302c563a2b596a08'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Define cut-off c0 = 60 # Half bandwidth bw <- c0 + c(-2.5, 2.5) # Subsets below and above threshold in specified bandwidth df_bw_below <- df %>% filter(days_since_last %>% between(bw[1], c0-1e-4)) df_bw_above <- df %>% filter(days_since_last %>% between(c0, bw[2])) # Alternative way to define tables # df_bw_below <- df %>% filter(days_since_last >= bw[1], days_since_last < c0) # df_bw_above <- df %>% filter(days_since_last >= c0, days_since_last <= bw[2]) df_bw <- bind_rows(df_bw_above, df_bw_below) dim(df_bw) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 181 4 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_96fe67253c2e06785da7559069410a89'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Define cut-off c0 = 60 # Double bandwidth bw <- c0 + c(-10, 10) # Subsets below and above threshold in specified bandwidth df_bw_below <- df %>% filter(days_since_last %>% between(bw[1], c0-1e-4)) df_bw_above <- df %>% filter(days_since_last %>% between(c0, bw[2])) # Alternative way to define tables # df_bw_below <- df %>% filter(days_since_last >= bw[1], days_since_last < c0) # df_bw_above <- df %>% filter(days_since_last >= c0, days_since_last <= bw[2]) df_bw <- bind_rows(df_bw_above, df_bw_below) dim(df_bw) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 629 4 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_57842fa1839030a04a8f067bfe722599'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load the file shipping<- readRDS("Causal_Data_Science_Data/shipping.rds") # Create a Data Frame df2=data.frame(shipping) head(df2) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_510c9a1749180bca8ea747c27efb4a55'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Density test # Check for continuous density along running variable. Manipulations could # lead to running variable being "crowded" right after cutoff. library(rddensity) rddd <- rddensity(df2$purchase_amount, c = 30) summary(rddd) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Manipulation testing using local polynomial density estimation. #> #> Number of obs = 6666 #> Model = unrestricted #> Kernel = triangular #> BW method = estimated #> VCE method = jackknife #> #> c = 30 Left of c Right of c #> Number of obs 3088 3578 #> Eff. Number of obs 2221 1955 #> Order est. (p) 2 2 #> Order bias (q) 3 3 #> BW est. (h) 22.909 20.394 #> #> Method T P > |T| #> Robust 5.9855 0 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning in summary.CJMrddensity(rddd): There are repeated observations. Point #> estimates and standard errors have been adjusted. Use option massPoints=FALSE #> to suppress this feature. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> P-values of binomial tests (H0: p=0.5). #> #> Window Length / 2 =c P>|T| #> 0.261 20 26 0.4614 #> 0.522 41 65 0.0250 #> 0.783 62 107 0.0007 #> 1.043 81 136 0.0002 #> 1.304 100 169 0.0000 #> 1.565 114 196 0.0000 #> 1.826 132 227 0.0000 #> 2.087 156 263 0.0000 #> 2.348 173 298 0.0000 #> 2.609 191 331 0.0000 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_f70982e29303a353b1071cc6442c8f75'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Visually check continuity at running variable rdd_plot <- rdplotdensity(rddd, df2$purchase_amount, plotN = 100) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](10_rdd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: The plot confirms as they did not overlap, we would have to suspect some kind of manipulation around the cut-off and could not use RDD to obtain valid results.
